title: "RoboSketch"
content:
# RoboSketch

Create and capture your ideas with ease using our minimalist wallpaper featuring a robotic hand holding a stylus. Our website provides a space for you to sketch, write notes or jot down ideas. With a clean and simple design, our wallpaper is perfect for creatives, designers, and anyone who needs inspiration. Let our wallpaper spark your creativity and help you bring your ideas to life!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a minimalist graphic of a robot hand holding a stylus or pen, with a space for taking notes or sketching ideas."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not repeat the title of the website.
- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
